title: Landing Gear Caution Warning System This system provides inp…
caption_en: Landing Gear Caution Warning System This system provides inputs to the and EICAS whenever an unsafe landing is attempted. This will activate voice and visual warnings to alert the crew.

title: Landing Gear Caution System One of the 2 conditions that act…
caption_en: Landing Gear Caution System One of the 2 conditions that activate the Caution CAS message GEAR and its indications is as shown.

title: This is the other condition that activates the "Caution" CAS…
caption_en: This is the other condition that activates the "Caution" CAS message GEAR and its indications are as shown.

title: Landing Gear Warning System The conditions that activate the…
caption_en: Landing Gear Warning System The conditions that activate the Warning CAS message GEAR and its indications are as shown.

title: Landing Gear Test System The gear warning system can be test…
caption_en: Landing Gear Test System The gear warning system can be tested by placing the TEST RESET selector to GEAR and depressing the PRESS TEST switch.

title: Selecting and pressing the switch will also illuminate the 3…
caption_en: Selecting and pressing the switch will also illuminate the 3 Advisory and 3 DOWN lights. However, the warning system is not tested.
